text: The Vice of Hope () is a 2018 Italian drama film directed by Edoardo De Angelis. It was screened in the Contemporary World Cinema section at the 2018 Toronto International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Pina Turco as Maria ==References== ==External links== * Category:2018 films Category:2018 drama films Category:Italian films Category:Italian drama films Category:Italian- language films
title: The Vice of Hope
